00023 #include <vle/extension/DifferenceEquation.hpp>
00024 #include <vle/extension/DifferenceEquationDbg.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace vd = vle::devs;
00027 namespace ve = vle::extension;
00028 namespace vv = vle::value;
00029 
00030 namespace Crop {
00031 
00032 class Unit : public ve::DifferenceEquation::Multiple
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     Unit(
00036        const vd::DynamicsInit& atom,
00037        const vd::InitEventList& evts)
00038         : ve::DifferenceEquation::Multiple(atom, evts)
00039     {
00040         // Parametres
00041         P_AreaMax = vv::toDouble(evts.get("P_AreaMax"));
00042         P_UnitTTExp = vv::toDouble(evts.get("P_UnitTTExp"));
00043         P_UnitTTSen = vv::toDouble(evts.get("P_UnitTTSen"));
00044         P_SlopeExpansion = vv::toDouble(evts.get("P_SlopeExpansion"));
00045         P_SlopeSenescence = vv::toDouble(evts.get("P_SlopeExpansion"));
00046         E_RateDeseaseTransmission = vv::toDouble(evts.get("E_RateDeseaseTransmission"));
00047         E_RateAlloDeposition = vv::toDouble(evts.get("E_RateAlloDeposition"));
00048         E_InfectiousPeriod = vv::toDouble(evts.get("E_InfectiousPeriod"));
00049         E_LatentPeriod = vv::toDouble(evts.get("E_LatentPeriod"));
00050         
00051         // Variables synchrones
00052         TempEff = createSync("TempEff"); 
00053         ThermalTime = createSync("ThermalTime"); 
00054         ActionTemp = createSync("ActionTemp");
00055         InDeposition = createSync("InDeposition");
00056         
00057         // Variables d'état
00058         RateAreaExpansion = createVar("RateAreaExpansion");
00059         RateAreaSenescence = createVar("RateAreaSenescence");
00060         AreaExpansion = createVar("AreaExpansion");
00061         AreaActive = createVar("AreaActive");
00062         AreaHealthy = createVar("AreaHealthy");
00063         AreaLatent = createVar("AreaLatent");
00064         AreaInfectious = createVar("AreaInfectious");        
00065         AreaRemoved = createVar("AreaRemoved");
00066         AreaSenescence = createVar("AreaSenescence");
00067         AreaDeseased = createVar("AreaDeseased");
00068         RateDeseaseTransmission = createVar("RateDeseaseTransmission");
00069         OutDeposition = createVar("OutDeposition");
00070     }
00071 
00072     virtual ~Unit()
00073     {}
00074 
00075 //@@begin:compute@@
00076 virtual void compute(const vd::Time& /*time*/)
00077 {
00078     // Vitesse de croissance
00079     RateAreaExpansion = TempEff() * (P_AreaMax * P_SlopeExpansion) * exp(-P_SlopeExpansion * (ThermalTime() - P_UnitTTExp)) / pow((1 + exp(-P_SlopeExpansion * (ThermalTime() - P_UnitTTExp))),2);
00080     
00081     /* Vitesse de senescence : pose un problème pour déterminer l'asymptote
00082      * (paramètre) alors qu'il depends de l'évolution de la maladie. 
00083      * Plutôt que de le résoudre analytiquement, on conditionne cette dérivée.  
00084      */ 
00085     double RateAreaSenescence_tmp = TempEff() * (P_AreaMax * P_SlopeSenescence) * exp(-P_SlopeSenescence * (ThermalTime() - P_UnitTTSen)) / pow((1 + exp(-P_SlopeSenescence * (ThermalTime() - P_UnitTTSen))),2);
00086     if ((AreaHealthy(-1) <= 0) and (AreaRemoved(-1) > P_AreaMax)) {
00087         RateAreaSenescence_tmp = 0;
00088     }
00089     RateAreaSenescence = RateAreaSenescence_tmp;
00090     
00091     // Surface totale : intégration de RateAreaExpansion
00092     AreaExpansion = AreaExpansion(-1) + RateAreaExpansion();
00093     
00094     // Surface senescente : intégration de RateAreaSenescence
00095     AreaSenescence = AreaSenescence(-1) + RateAreaSenescence();
00096     
00097     // Vitesse d'infection au sein de l'unité
00098     RateDeseaseTransmission = E_RateDeseaseTransmission;
00099         
00100     // Surface saine, création par la croissance, destruction par l'infection et la senescence naturelle
00101     AreaHealthy = fmax(
00102         AreaHealthy(-1) 
00103         +RateAreaExpansion() 
00104         -(RateDeseaseTransmission() * AreaInfectious(-1) * AreaHealthy(-1)/AreaExpansion(-1)) 
00105         -(RateAreaSenescence() * AreaHealthy(-1)/AreaActive(-1))
00106         -(InDeposition()* AreaHealthy(-1)/AreaExpansion(-1)),0);
00107     
00108     // Surface latente, création par l'infection, destruction par la propagation du pathogene et la senescence
00109     AreaLatent = fmax(
00110         AreaLatent(-1) 
00111         +(RateDeseaseTransmission() * AreaInfectious(-1) * AreaHealthy(-1)/AreaExpansion(-1))
00112         +(InDeposition()* AreaHealthy(-1)/AreaExpansion(-1)) 
00113         -(1/E_LatentPeriod * AreaLatent(-1)) 
00114         -(RateAreaSenescence() * AreaLatent(-1)/AreaActive(-1)),0);
00115     
00116     // Surface infectieuse, creation par la propagation du pathogene, destruction par le pathogene
00117     AreaInfectious = fmax(
00118         AreaInfectious(-1) 
00119         +(1/E_LatentPeriod * AreaLatent(-1)) 
00120         -(1/E_InfectiousPeriod * AreaInfectious(-1)) 
00121         -(RateAreaSenescence() * AreaInfectious(-1)/AreaActive(-1)),0);
00122     
00123     // Surface détruite par le pathogène et la senescence naturelle
00124     AreaRemoved = fmin( 
00125         AreaRemoved(-1) 
00126         +(1/E_InfectiousPeriod * AreaInfectious(-1)) 
00127         +RateAreaSenescence(),P_AreaMax);  
00128         
00129     // Surface détruite par la maladie
00130     // (AreaRemoved() - AreaSenescence())
00131     
00132     // Surface active : différence totale - senescence
00133     AreaActive = fmax(AreaExpansion() - AreaRemoved(),0);
00134     
00135     
00136     // Surface malade = total des surfaces infectée (L + I + R causé par maladie)
00137     AreaDeseased = AreaLatent() + AreaInfectious() +(AreaRemoved() - AreaSenescence());
00138     
00139     // Emission de spores
00140     OutDeposition = E_RateAlloDeposition * AreaInfectious();
00141 }
00142 //@@end:compute@@
00143 
00144 //@@begin:initValue@@
00145 virtual void initValue(const vd::Time& /*time*/)
00146 {
00147     RateAreaExpansion = 0.0;
00148     RateAreaSenescence = 0.0;
00149     AreaExpansion = 0.001;
00150     AreaActive = 0.001;
00151     AreaHealthy = 0.001;
00152     AreaLatent = 0.0;
00153     AreaInfectious = 0.0;
00154     AreaRemoved = 0.0;
00155     AreaSenescence = 0.0;
00156     AreaDeseased = 0.0;
00157     RateDeseaseTransmission = E_RateDeseaseTransmission;    
00158     OutDeposition = 0;
00159 }
00160 //@@end:initValue@@
00161 
00162 private:
00163 //@@begin:user@@
00164 //@@end:user@@
00165 
00166     double P_AreaMax; 
00167     double P_UnitTTExp; 
00168     double P_UnitTTSen; 
00169     double P_SlopeExpansion; 
00170     double P_SlopeSenescence ; 
00171     double E_RateDeseaseTransmission; 
00172     double E_RateAlloDeposition; 
00173     double E_InfectiousPeriod; 
00174     double E_LatentPeriod; 
00177     Sync ActionTemp;
00178     Sync TempEff;
00179     Sync ThermalTime;
00180     Sync InDeposition;
00181     
00182     Var RateAreaExpansion;
00183     Var RateAreaSenescence;
00184     Var AreaExpansion;
00185     Var AreaActive;
00186     Var AreaHealthy;
00187     Var AreaLatent;
00188     Var AreaInfectious;
00189     Var AreaRemoved;
00190     Var AreaSenescence;
00191     Var AreaDeseased;
00192     Var RateDeseaseTransmission;
00193     Var OutDeposition;
00194     
00195 };
00196 
00197 } // namespace Unit
